text: Adrian Genziani (born 6 May 1962) is a British rower. He competed in the men's coxed pair event at the 1984 Summer Olympics. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:British male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Great Britain Category:Rowers at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:People from Warwick
title: Adrian Genziani
